name: TOTFAN Games
tag_list: socialgames, virtualgoods, digitalcollecting, collectibles, music, sports, entertainment, media, cpg, fmcg, licenses
overview:
TOTFAN Games is a Startup founded in Barcelona on June 2010 by Raquel Iglesias and Jaume Teixi, with the aim to become an industry standard in global digital collecting.

TOTFAN’s main goal is to merge two passions: collecting and technology, willing to recall the childhood values and emotions when we played with stickers, and bring them to the digital era.

TOTFAN Games is the most innovative and social-centric solution in the digital collecting arena. The platform, fully developed in-house and based on industry standards, is a multidevice and crossbrowser Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solution with a high level of usability. It has been designed as a digital album where fans create an online community around a brand, a topic or a passion.
